bibl.title: Notationes legentis.
bibl.note: Village Gymnasiarchs. [The latest attestation is A.D. 2 (B.G.U. IV, 1201).] - Εὐσχήμονες, Addenda [to: IDEM, Εὐσχήμονες in Roman Egypt, BASP 30 (1993) pp. 105-113.] - Two Old Friends. [The translation of B.G.U. I, 140, 32-33 and P. Fay. 20 (= S.B. XIV, 11648), 16.] - More Ἀποκρίματα. [An up-to-date list.] - More on Ἀναχώρησις. [The categories of fugitives in P. Oxy. LX, 4060 (A.D. 161).] - Proscription. [P. Oxy. ined.: lower portion of col. II published by: Eric G. TURNER, The Papyrologist at Work = GRBS Monograph 6 (Durham, North Carolina, 1973) pp. 44-45, A.D. 147/148.]
bibl.seg: 145.4 B.G.U. I, 140; IV, 1201 P. Fay. 20 P. Oxy. ined. P. Oxy. LX, 4060
